meanings.definition: A book size resulting from folding a sheet of paper into twelve leaves.
meanings.sent1: I found a duodecimo book at the library today.
meanings.sent2: The duodecimo was small and easy to carry around.
meanings.sent3: The duodecimo book was so tiny, it looked like a pocket dictionary!
meanings.sent4: Her collection of duodecimo books was like a miniature library.
meanings.sent5: The duodecimo size made the book feel like a hidden treasure.

meanings.sent1: She enjoyed reading the duodecimo before bed every night.
meanings.sent2: The bookstore had a special section just for duodecimos.
meanings.sent3: The duodecimo book was so cute, it fit perfectly in her purse.
meanings.sent4: His love for duodecimos was as big as his love for adventure.
meanings.sent5: The duodecimo book was like a little gem waiting to be discovered.
